projects.title: DMD (Distillery Metrics Dashboard)
projects.description: A data-driven dashboard with advanced visualisations to help distilleries forecast and mitigate long-term production deficits, ensuring strategic planning and operational efficiency.

projects.title: Aircraft Range Map
projects.description: A comparative mapping tool to evaluate aircraft range based on fuel capacity, wind conditions, and payload variations.

projects.title: TimeGuide
projects.description: An application designed to assist VATSIM users in identifying optimal flight times based on current and forecasted ATC coverage.

projects.title: Buckshot Roulette Assist
projects.description: A Python app to assist players playing the popular Buckshot Roulette game.

projects.title: Sidewinder
projects.description: A Chrome extension and Python application designed to streamline form completion, reducing the time required for job applications.

projects.title: SimulateBlackjack
projects.description: A Python application which simulates the game of Blackjack, providing insights into optimal strategies and expected outcomes.

projects.title: Running Count
projects.description: An interactive web-based game designed to help players master card counting techniques in Blackjack.

projects.title: SeaChange Dashboard
projects.description: A team project for HackPompey2025, this dashboard provides real-time data visualisation and analysis for pollution in the Portsmouth Port area.

projects.title: 3 Card Poker Analysis
projects.description: A platform for learning Julia by simulating hands of 3-card poker and using Ï‡2 tests to determine if online games are biased.

projects.title: Wordsearch Solver Script
projects.description: A Python script that returns words found within a grid.

projects.title: Wordle Solver Script
projects.description: Two scripts for assisting with the popular game Wordle, one for solving a wordle and another for finding the best starting word.
